help.description: Use the help function to search for the term using a filter (0=show all results)

bat.description: Run a batch file with commands

coc.description: Fast travel to location, e.g. coc Riverwood

coc_qasmoke.description: Fast travel to the testing hall

kill.description: Open console, click on target, type kill to kill it

resurrect.description: Open console, click on target, type resurrect to bring it back to life

unlock.description: In console, target a door/chest so you can see its ID and then type unlock

setownership.description: In console target an item, type setownership and you can safely take it without stealing

set_timescale.description: Sets the timescale to real time, 16 is default

set_killmove.description: Sets chance for finishing moves to 50%

addfac.description: Adds the selected NPC to a faction

addfac_marriage.description: Enables the marriage options for the current selected NPC

addfac_follower.description: Enables the follower options for the current selected NPC

equipitem.description: Have your selected follower equip and use the item

setessential.description: Turns the selected NPC mortal, set to 1 to turn the NPC immortal

showracemenu.description: You can modify the characters race, gender and appearance

modav_carryweight.description: Increase the maximum weight you can carry by 100

setav_speedmult.description: Increase the player's speed by 20%, 100 is default

setgs_jumpheight.description: Increase the player's jump height by 20%, 100 is default

setav_weaponspeed.description: Increases the player's swing speed by 20%, 1 is default

setav_leftweaponspeed.description: Increases the player's left hand swing speed by 20%, 1 is default

forceav_shoutrecovery.description: Use Dragonshouts without cooldown, 1 is default

setscale.description: Changes the size of the player from small 0.1, normal 1 to huge 10

advlevel.description: Increases current level by 1, caution you can't choose magicka, health or stamina

setlevel.description: Changes player level to #, caution you can't choose magicka, health or stamina

psb.description: Gives the player all shouts (souls still required), spells, animalistic abilities

setav_rightitemcharge.description: Sets the charge of the righthand item to 100

setav_leftitemcharge.description: Sets the charge of the lefthand item to 100

alchemy.name: Alchemist
alchemy.description: Potions and poisons you make are 20% stronger

alchemy.name: Alchemist
alchemy.description: Potions and poisons you make are 40% stronger

alchemy.name: Alchemist
alchemy.description: Potions and poisons you make are 60% stronger

alchemy.name: Alchemist
alchemy.description: Potions and poisons you make are 80% stronger

alchemy.name: Alchemist
alchemy.description: Potions and poisons you make are twice as strong

alchemy.name: Physician
alchemy.description: Potions you mix that restore Health, Magicka or Stamina are 25% more powerful

alchemy.name: Benefactor
alchemy.description: Potions you mix with beneficial effects have an additional 25% greater magnitude

alchemy.name: Experimenter
alchemy.description: Eating an ingredient reveals first two effects

alchemy.name: Experimenter
alchemy.description: Eating an ingredient reveals first three effects

alchemy.name: Experimenter
alchemy.description: Eating an ingredient reveals all its effects

alchemy.name: Poisoner
alchemy.description: Poisons you mix are 25% more effective

alchemy.name: Concentrated Poison
alchemy.description: Poisons applied to weapons last for twice as many hits

alchemy.name: Green Thumb
alchemy.description: Two ingredients are gathered from plants

alchemy.name: Purity
alchemy.description: All negative effects are removed from created potions, and all positive effects are removed from created poisons

alteration.name: Novice Alteration
alteration.description: Cast Novice level Alteration spells for half magicka

alteration.name: Alteration Dual Casting
alteration.description: Dual casting an Alteration spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version

alteration.name: Apprentice Alteration
alteration.description: Cast Apprentice level Alteration spells for half magicka

alteration.name: Adept Alteration
alteration.description: Cast Adept level Alteration spells for half magicka

alteration.name: Expert Alteration
alteration.description: Cast Expert level Alteration spells for half magicka

alteration.name: Atronach
alteration.description: Absorb 30% of the magicka of any spells that hit you

alteration.name: Master Alteration
alteration.description: Cast Master level Alteration spells for half magicka

alteration.name: Mage Armor
alteration.description: Protection spells like Stoneflesh are twice as strong if not wearing armor

alteration.name: Mage Armor
alteration.description: Protection spells like Stoneflesh are 2.5 times as strong if not wearing armor

alteration.name: Mage Armor
alteration.description: Protection spells like Stoneflesh are three times as strong if not wearing armor

archery.name: Overdraw
archery.description: Bows do twice as much damage

archery.name: Critical Shot
archery.description: 10% chance of a critical hit that does extra damage

archery.name: Critical Shot

archery.name: Hunter's Discipline
archery.description: Recover twice as many arrows from dead bodies

archery.name: Ranger
archery.description: Able to move faster with a drawn bow

archery.name: Eagle Eye
archery.description: Pressing Block while aiming will zoom in your view

archery.name: Power Shot
archery.description: Arrows stagger all but the largest opponents 50% of the time

archery.name: Steady Hand
archery.description: Zooming in with a bow slows time by 25%

archery.name: Steady Hand
archery.description: Zooming in with a bow slows time by 50%

archery.name: Bullseye
archery.description: 15% chance of paralyzing the target for a few seconds

blocking.name: Deflect Arrows
blocking.description: Arrows that hit the shield do no damage

blocking.name: Elemental Protection
blocking.description: Blocking with a shield reduces incoming fire, frost, and shock damage by 50%

blocking.name: Block Runner

blocking.name: Power Bash
blocking.description: Able to do a power bash

blocking.name: Deadly Bash
blocking.description: Bashing does five times more damage

blocking.name: Disarming Bash
blocking.description: Chance to disarm when power bashing

blocking.name: Shield Charge
blocking.description: Sprinting with a shield raised knocks down most targets

blocking.name: Quick Reflexes
blocking.description: Time slows down if you are blocking during an enemy's power attack

placeatme.description: Places a item/mob/npc at your location

showinventory.description: Lists current player inventory contents and ids

dragonscale_light.name: Dragonscale Gauntlets of Peerless Sure Grip

daedric_heavy.name: Konahrik (chance to heal on low hp & damage nearby enemies)
Daedric Gauntlets of Peerless Sure Grip

jewelry.name: Amulet of Talos (-20% cd on shouts)

spell_tomes.name: Spell Tome: Bane of the Undead

enchanting_examples.description: Necklace that will give you a permanent Dremora Lord Pet
Ring that will give you a permanent Shade of Anriel Gane
Ring that will improve your Sneaking and will make you harder to detect
Ring that will grant night vision

markfordelete.description: Click on an object you want to remove, leave/enter or save/load an area to delete the marked object

placeatme.description: While in console click an item and it will place item [object-id] next to it

twf.description: Toggle wireframe view to view problems with objects

getpos.description: Returns the position in axis value of the selected object (e.g., getpos x)

setpos.description: Sets the position of the selected object (e.g., setpos z 200)

getangle.description: Returns the angle of the selected object (e.g., getangle y)

setangle.description: Sets the angle of the selected object (e.g., setangle x 45)

rotate.description: Rotates the selected object manually (e.g., rotate x 45)
